About Us

"From tacos to tech to timeless properties, Trion Holdings partners with businesses that are ready to scale and make an impact."

Family Owned & Operated Since 1977

For more than 45 years, Trion Holdings has grown from a family-owned real estate platform into a diversified investment company with holdings across hospitality, real estate, and other growth industries. We bring together the strength of institutional discipline with the creativity and agility of a family enterprise.

Our approach is grounded in conservative underwriting, operational expertise, and hands-on management. By leveraging a trusted network of industry partners, we identify opportunities where scaling, repositioning, and strategic execution can unlock significant value.

Whether building for sustained growth or positioning for a strategic exit, Trion Holdings invests with purpose—driving performance while preserving the entrepreneurial spirit that has defined us since 1977.
